
```{r}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(plotly)

pge_data_raw <- readRDS("pge_data_raw.rds")

bay_zips <- readRDS("bay_zips.rds")

pge_data <-
  pge_data_raw %>% 
  filter(
    CUSTOMERCLASS %in% c(
      "Elec- Commercial",
      "Elec- Residential"
    )
  ) %>% 
  group_by(
    MONTH, 
    YEAR, 
    CUSTOMERCLASS
  ) %>% 
  summarize(
    TOTALKBTU = sum(TOTALKBTU, na.rm = T)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    DATE = 
      paste(
        YEAR,
        MONTH, 
        "01",
        sep="-"
      ) %>% as.Date()
  )
```
